inapplicable.help: Elements must only use supported ARIA attributes

inapplicable.help: ARIA commands must have an accessible name

inapplicable.help: ARIA dialog and alertdialog nodes should have an accessible name

inapplicable.help: ARIA meter nodes must have an accessible name

inapplicable.help: ARIA progressbar nodes must have an accessible name

inapplicable.help: Elements must only use permitted ARIA attributes

inapplicable.description: Ensures elements with ARIA roles have all required ARIA attributes
inapplicable.help: Required ARIA attributes must be provided

inapplicable.help: Certain ARIA roles must be contained by particular parents

inapplicable.help: ARIA roles used must conform to valid values

inapplicable.help: ARIA toggle fields must have an accessible name

inapplicable.help: ARIA tooltip nodes must have an accessible name

inapplicable.help: ARIA treeitem nodes should have an accessible name

inapplicable.help: ARIA attributes must conform to valid values

passes.description: Ensure the <caption> element does not contain the same text as the summary attribute
passes.help: tables should not have the same summary and caption

none.message: Content of summary attribute and <caption> are not duplicated
Content of summary attribute and <caption> are not duplicated

passes.description: Ensure that each cell in a table that uses the headers attribute refers only to other cells in that table
passes.help: Table cells that use the headers attribute must only refer to cells in the same table

all.message: The headers attribute is exclusively used to refer to other cells in the table
The headers attribute is exclusively used to refer to other cells in the table

passes.description: Ensure that <th> elements and elements with role=columnheader/rowheader have data cells they describe
passes.help: Table headers in a data table must refer to data cells

all.message: All table header cells refer to data cells

incomplete.description: Ensures the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA minimum contrast ratio thresholds
